General.Name: Huayi Compressor Co Ltd
General.Description: Changhong Huayi Compressor Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, develops, manufactures, and sells various compressors in China and internationally. Its products are used in refrigeration appliances, which includes refrigerators, freezers, water dispensers, ice machines, and dehumidifiers. The company was formerly known as Huayi Compressor Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Changhong Huayi Compressor Co., Ltd. in July 2018. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Jingdezhen, China.

1.Name: Mr. Hai Tao Pang
1.Title: Chief Accountant and Deputy Gen. Mang.
